summary: This code is for HELog, a logging tool that allows recording logs to the hard drive and displaying them through a UI. It also has filtering capabilities for past logs. The dependencies are PINCache and MASConstraint. The TODO list includes optimizing real-time display performance for single log entries and supporting file stream write method.
